mods.abstract: Articles describe the "Doings of Colored Esso Boosters" and Mardi Gras parades in Baton Rouge. Headline for second page is "Baton Rouge's colored population celebrates Mardi Gras".

titleInfo.title: Mardi Gras Mambo: Selections from LSU Libraries Special Collections

Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
mods.note: Stanacolan Vol. XVII No. 22, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.
